messages.text:
Hello adg (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go

Oh, sorry, I didn't see this one.  Or skimmed it and assumed it was a
different instance of the same problem.

On Wed, Sep 26, 2012 at 9:52 AM, <gri@golang.org> wrote:

> *** Abandoned ***
>
> http://codereview.appspot.com/**6567047/<http://codereview.appspot.com/6567047/>
>

Neither did I, sorry.

> different instance of the same problem.

subject: code review 6567047: doc/go1.1.html: fix JSON header
